Articles.Content:
The Creeping Willows

Well hello brave kerbonauts, I enjoy writing and i would just love to get some feedback on some of my creative writing.

The Creeping Willows is a story that I AM STILL DEVELOPING and is inspired by the game: The Stanley Parable which i loved by the way.

I would have put this on the Fan Works section but this has nothing to do with Ksp or space maybe another time i do have another story, but that is for another time munchkins.

The story is constantly narrated and the main character Leonard rarely speaks, I chose a darker theme than my usual dark themed story's.

In the story you will learn about Leonard's troubled past and bleak future through the brain of good old Capn_Jamerica.

I will leave a link to my Google drive if you wish to see the story and maybe even follow it's development.

Thank you for reading this and please consider sending me some feedback and maybe even buy The Stanley Parable.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B-8Zr28DUGe1XzdaTnBsN1hWWWc/edit?usp=sharing
